Display languages with country attribute: Display languages with country attribute as ISO 639-1 (e.g. pt-BR = pt)

Sonarr URL (add URL base if configured): Sonarr URL (add URL base if configured)

Provider: Enable Legendas TV (mostly pt-: Provider: Enable Legendas TV (mostly pt-BR; UNRAR NEEDED)
Automatically extract and use embedded s: Automatically extract and use embedded subtitles upon media addition (with configured default mods)
After automatic extraction of embedded s: After automatic extraction of embedded subtitles, also immediately search for available subtitles?
Don't search for subtitles of a language: Don't search for subtitles of a language if there are embedded subtitles inside the media file (MKV/MP4)?
Don't search for subtitles of a language if they already exist on the filesystem (metadata/filesystem)?
How strict should these subtitles existi: How strict should these subtitles existing on the filesystem be detected?
Include non-text subtitle formats (anyth: Include non-text subtitle formats (anything else than .srt/.ssa/.ass/.vtt; embedded or external) in the above?

Scheduler: Overwrite manually selected s: Scheduler: Overwrite manually selected subtitles when better found

History: amount of items to store histor: History: amount of items to store historical data for
How many download tries per subtitle (on: How many download tries per subtitle (on timeout or error)
Ignore anything in the following paths (: Ignore anything in the following paths (comma-separated)

hybrid: current item or next episode: hybrid: current item or next episode

(wrong FPS, sub: %(subtitle_fps)s, medi: (wrong FPS, sub: %(subtitle_fps)s, media: unknown, low impact mode)
Shows the current on deck items and allo: Shows the current on deck items and allows you to individually (force-) refresh their metadata/subtitles.
Lists items with missing subtitles. Clic: Lists items with missing subtitles. Click on "Find recent items with missing subs" to update list
Extracts the not yet extracted embedded: Extracts the not yet extracted embedded subtitles of all episodes for the current season with all configured default modifications
Extracts embedded subtitles of all episo: Extracts embedded subtitles of all episodes for the current season with all configured default modifications
Refreshes %(the_movie_series_season_epis: Refreshes %(the_movie_series_season_episode)s, possibly searching for missing and picking up new subtitles on disk
Change the color of the subtitle: Change the color of the subtitle
Adds the requested color to every line o: Adds the requested color to every line of the subtitle. Support depends on player.
Fix common and whitespace/punctuation is: Fix common and whitespace/punctuation issues in subtitles
Removes all possible style tags from the: Removes all possible style tags from the subtitle, such as font, bold, color etc.
Some playback devices don't properly han: Some playback devices don't properly handle right-to-left markers for punctuation. Physically swap punctuation. Applicable to languages: hebrew
Change the FPS of the subtitle: Change the FPS of the subtitle
Re-syncs the subtitle to the framerate o: Re-syncs the subtitle to the framerate of the current media file.
Removes tags, text and characters from s: Removes tags, text and characters from subtitles that are meant for hearing impaired people
Fix issues that happen when a subtitle g: Fix issues that happen when a subtitle gets converted from bitmap to text through OCR
Change the timing of the subtitle: Change the timing of the subtitle
Adds or substracts a certain amount of t: Adds or substracts a certain amount of time from the whole subtitle to match your media
Reset the plugin's menu history storage: Reset the plugin's menu history storage
Show the current %(incl_excl_list_name)s: Show the current %(incl_excl_list_name)s (mainly used for the automatic tasks)

When any audio stream is not Subtitle La: When any audio stream is not Subtitle Language (1)
When any audio stream is not any configu: When any audio stream is not any configured language
Reverse punctuation in RTL languages (he: Reverse punctuation in RTL languages (heb, ara, fas)

enable SZ for all items by default, use: enable SZ for all items by default, use ignore mode
disable SZ for all items by default, use: disable SZ for all items by default, use include mode
